template.name: Rittal CMC-TC template
template.description: Template based on SNMP V1 to query Rittal CMC-TC devices

item.name: airTemp11LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: airTemp12LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: airTemp21LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: airTemp22LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: airTemp31LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: airTemp32LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: alarmRCT
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: fanSpeed
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: heatflowRCT
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: rpm11LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: rpm12LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: rpm21LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: rpm31LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: rpm32LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: statusLCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Temp1LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Temp2LCP
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: valve
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: valveActual
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: warningRCT
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: waterFlow
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: waterInTemp
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: waterOutTemp
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: {Rittal CMC-TC template:rpm11LCP.last()}<1000 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:rpm12LCP.last()}<1000 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:rpm21LCP.last()}<1000 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:rpm32LCP.last()}<1000 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:rpm31LCP.last()}<1000 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:rpm32LCP.last()}<1000
trigger.name: Rittal fan speed error

trigger.expression: {Rittal CMC-TC template:airTemp11LCP.last()}>35 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:airTemp12LCP.last()}>35 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:airTemp21LCP.last()}>35 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:airTemp22LCP.last()}>35 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:airTemp31LCP.last()}>35 or {Rittal CMC-TC template:airTemp32LCP.last()}>35
trigger.name: Rittal temperatures too high
